lpml.schemas.desc: Associate schemas to LPML files in the current project.
lpml.schemas.url.desc: A URL or absolute file path to a schema. Can be a relative path (starting with './') in workspace and workspace folder settings.
lpml.schemas.fileMatch.desc: An array of file patterns to match against when resolving LPML files to schemas. `*` and '**' can be used as a wildcard. Exclusion patterns can also be defined and start with '!'. A file matches when there is at least one matching pattern and the last matching pattern is not an exclusion pattern.
lpml.schemas.fileMatch.item.desc: A file pattern that can contain '*' and '**' to match against when resolving LPML files to schemas. When beginning with '!', it defines an exclusion pattern.
lpml.schemas.schema.desc: The schema definition for the given URL. The schema only needs to be provided to avoid accesses to the schema URL.
lpml.format.keepLines.desc: Keep all existing new lines when formatting.
lpml.format.trailingCommas.desc: Controls whether trailing commas are added when formatting.
lpml.format.keyQuotes.desc: Controls which quotes are used for object keys when formatting.
lpml.format.stringQuotes.desc: Controls which quotes are used for strings other than keys when formatting.
lpml.format.tabSize.desc: Overrides the number of spaces used for indentation when formatting. Can be a number or boolean value `true` to use tab character. When unset or set to `false`, the editor's tab size is used.
lpml.format.startIgnoreDirective.desc: The start of ignore directive for formatting. Default to `lpml-fmt: off`. Only works for `//` line comments.
lpml.format.endIgnoreDirective.desc: The end of ignore directive for formatting. Default to `lpml-fmt: on`. Only works for `//` line comments.
lpml.tracing.desc: Traces the communication between VS Code and the LPML language server.
lpml.decorateAllColors.desc: Try to decorate all colors in LPML files instead of schema-specified colors.
lpml.maxItemsComputed.desc: The maximum number of outline symbols and folding regions computed (limited for performance reasons).
lpml.maxItemsExceededInformation.desc: Show notification when exceeding the maximum number of outline symbols and folding regions.
lpml.enableSchemaDownload.desc: When enabled, JSON schemas can be fetched from http and https locations.
